column4: hi, when I want to live use ubuntu, or install it to disk I get this error http://img717.imageshack.us/img717/6566/dsc00381t.jpg does someone know what it means?
looks like a problem with ur video card? its not working with the nouveau kernel module.....
that's possible indeed. KM0201, I'm installing 12.04
you can disable nouveau during boot... and use something else so it will boot up properly
